title: New: Billy Who – Just A Memory
content:
Really enjoying this debut from Stockholm duo Billy Who (Olivia Sandell and Eric Ahlqvist).

Characterised by Sandell’s unique, airy vocals, it’s hook driven dream pop at its best. With the two of them also part of Swedish outfit Oh My O, Just A Memory marks the start of this new project. Check it out below. (via)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
